trans-unit.source: A data bound list control that displays items using templates.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定列表控件，用于可显示使用模板的项。

trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: [Templates](#templates)
trans-unit.target: [模板](#templates)

trans-unit.target: [自定义 DataList 控件的外观](#customizing_the_appearance_of_the_datalist_control)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control to display a template-defined data bound list.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件来显示模板定义的数据绑定列表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control supports selecting and editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件支持选择和编辑。

trans-unit.source: Templates
trans-unit.target: 模板

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control can be manipulated by using templates.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件可以通过使用模板进行操作。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the supported templates.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了支持的模板。

trans-unit.source: Template Name
trans-unit.target: 模板名称

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义，提供的内容和布局中的交替项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，`ItemTemplate`使用。

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for the item currently being edited in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义，内容和布局为项提供当前正在编辑中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，`ItemTemplate`使用。

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for the footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义，提供的内容和布局页脚部分的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a footer section will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，则不会显示页脚部分。

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for the header section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义，提供的内容和布局标头部分的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a header section will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，则不会显示的表头部分。

trans-unit.source: Required template that provides the content and layout for items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 中的项提供的内容和布局的所需的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for the currently selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义，提供的内容和布局中的当前选定项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>使用。

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for the separator between items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义，提供的内容和布局中项之间的分隔符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a separator will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，则不会显示分隔符。

trans-unit.source: At the very minimum, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A> needs to be defined to display the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 至少，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>需要定义以显示中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Additional templates can be used to provide a custom look to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用其他模板来提供自定义信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control
trans-unit.target: 自定义 DataList 控件的外观

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control may be customized by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>可以通过设置控件的不同部分的样式属性自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: Style Property
trans-unit.target: 样式属性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的样式中的交替项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the item being edited in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定在所编辑的项的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the footer in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定在页脚的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the header in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的标头中的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定为中的项的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定中的选定项的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the separator between the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的样式中的项之间的分隔符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also show or hide different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以显示或隐藏的控件的不同部分。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出用于控制哪些部分是显示还是隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 显示或隐藏的页脚部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the header section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 显示或隐藏的标头部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Display Direction and Layout
trans-unit.target: 显示方向和布局

trans-unit.source: The display direction of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control can be vertical or horizontal.
trans-unit.target: 显示方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件均可以是垂直或水平。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property to specify the display direction.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>属性指定的显示方向。

trans-unit.source: The layout of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is controlled with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 布局<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `RepeatLayout.Table` will display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> in a table format, while `RepeatLayout.Flow` displays the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> without a table structure.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Table`将显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>以表格格式，而`RepeatLayout.Flow`显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>没有表结构。

trans-unit.source: Security
trans-unit.target: 安全性

trans-unit.source: The `DataList` control can contain controls that enable users to enter information.
trans-unit.target: `DataList`控件可以包含使用户能够输入信息的控件。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information about security, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 有关安全性的详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.target: 声明性语法

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件来显示数据源中的项的列表。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for alternating items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中交替项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that represents the style properties for alternating items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中交替项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一个空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property to provide a custom style for the alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>中的属性，以提供自定义样式的交替项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 常见样式属性，可调整包括前景颜色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的样式增强的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 项中的样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件从一个项样式属性继承到另一个层次结构。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 由层次结构中较高的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置得较低的项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性、 中的所有其他项样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件还具有红色字体。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供通用控件外观。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写继承的样式设置是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高级别的项样式属性的。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>属性，重写中指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了从最高到最低的层次结构顺序。

trans-unit.source: Precedence
trans-unit.target: 优先级

trans-unit.source: Style property
trans-unit.target: 样式属性

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the alternating items, place the `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的交替项的自定义样式，将放置`<AlternatingItemStyle>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出内打开的样式特性`<AlternatingItemStyle>`标记。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property to specify a different background color for alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>属性来指定不同的背景色中的交替项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for alternating items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 中交替项的模板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> object that contains the template for alternating items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 对象，该对象包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中交替项的模板。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> property to control the contents of alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>属性来控制中交替项的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of alternating items is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 由控制交替项的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the alternating items, place the `<AlternatingItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定个交替项的模板，将放置`<AlternatingItemTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<AlternatingItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<AlternatingItemTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommandName>字段来表示`Edit`命令名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index number of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control to edit.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中要编辑的选定项的索引号。

trans-unit.source: The index number of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control to edit.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中要编辑的选定项的索引号。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to programmatically specify the item to edit.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>属性以编程方式指定要编辑的项。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to determine the index of the item selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性来确定为编辑选定的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property is zero based.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>属性是从零开始。

trans-unit.source: To unselect an item, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消选择某个项，请设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>属性`-1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the item selected for editing in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中为进行编辑而选定的项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that contains the style properties for the item selected for editing in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中为进行编辑而选定的项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一个空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A> property to provide a custom style for the item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>属性以进行编辑在选定的项提供自定义样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 常见样式属性，可调整包括前景颜色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的样式增强的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 项中的样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件从一个项样式属性继承到另一个层次结构。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 由层次结构中较高的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置得较低的项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性、 中的所有其他项样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件还具有红色字体。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供通用控件外观。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写继承的样式设置是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高级别的项样式属性的。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>属性，重写中指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了从最高到最低的层次结构顺序。

trans-unit.source: Precedence
trans-unit.target: 优先级

trans-unit.source: Style Property
trans-unit.target: 样式属性

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the item selected for editing, place the `<EditItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定为编辑选定的项的自定义样式，将放置`<EditItemStyle>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<EditItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出内打开的样式特性`<EditItemStyle>`标记。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemTemplate%2A> property to control the contents of the item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemTemplate%2A>属性控制为在中编辑选定的项的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the item selected for editing is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 选择用于编辑由控制项的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the item selected for editing, place the `<EditItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定用于选择要编辑的项目的模板，将放置`<EditItemTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EditItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<EditItemTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the rows of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> control, defined in each template of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control, are extracted and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> 控件的行（在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件的每一模板中定义）是否被提取和显示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the rows of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> control, defined in each template of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control, are extracted and displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> 控件的行（在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件的各模板中定义）被提取和显示，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are specified by using templates.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>使用模板来指定控件时。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you list controls that you want to display in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，你可以列出你想要在模板中显示的控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control in a template and display the rows of the table.
trans-unit.target: 也可以放置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件模板中，并显示表的行。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ExtractTemplateRows%2A> property to specify whether the rows of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control defined in each template of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are extracted and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ExtractTemplateRows%2A>属性指定是否的行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件中的每个模板定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件被提取和显示。

trans-unit.source: All rows extracted from the templates of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in a single table.
trans-unit.target: 从模板中提取的所有行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件显示单个表中。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a single table from other smaller tables and still maintain the features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以从其他较小的表创建一个表并仍然维持的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, you must provide a well-formed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control for each template you want to include in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，你必须提供一个格式良好<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>想要包括在每个模板的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Only the rows of the tables will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 将显示仅表的行。

trans-unit.source: All other content in the template will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 将忽略模板中的所有其他内容。

trans-unit.source: You must use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control for this feature to work properly.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制此功能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable?displayProperty=nameWithType> control is not compatible with this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件不符合此属性。

trans-unit.source: When you create a cell for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control in a template, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.ColumnSpan%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to control the number of columns the cell spans.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件在模板中，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.ColumnSpan%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象以控制的单元格所跨越的列数。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.RowSpan%2A> property to control the number of rows the cell spans.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.RowSpan%2A>属性控制的单元格所跨越的行数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> properties do not affect the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control when this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性不会影响的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制当此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件的脚注部分的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that contains the style properties for the footer section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象，该对象包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件的脚注部分的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一个空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于提供页脚部分的自定义样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 常见样式属性，可调整包括前景颜色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的样式增强的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control inherits the style settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件继承的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>属性也将有红色字体。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以通过设置的单个样式属性提供通用控件外观。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置重写继承的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>属性，重写中指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the footer section, place the `<FooterStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定页脚部分的自定义样式，将放置`<FooterStyle>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<FooterStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出内打开的样式特性`<FooterStyle>`标记。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowFooter%2A> property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowFooter%2A>属性必须设置为`true`，此属性才可见。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property to specify a custom background color for the footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>属性也将有红色字体。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以通过设置的单个样式属性提供通用控件外观。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置重写继承的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>属性，重写中指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the footer section, place the `<FooterTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定页脚部分的模板，将放置`<FooterTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<FooterTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<FooterTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.source: Description

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for the heading section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件的标题部分的模板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for the heading section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，它包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件的标题部分的模板。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderTemplate%2A> property to control the contents of the heading section.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderTemplate%2A>属性控制的标题部分的内容。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the header section is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 标头部分的外观由控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowHeader%2A> property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowHeader%2A>属性必须设置为`true`，此属性才可见。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the heading section, place the `<HeaderTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定标题部分的模板，将放置`<HeaderTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<HeaderTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<HeaderTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> object based on the specified templates and styles for the list-item type.
trans-unit.target: 根据列表项类型的指定模板和样式初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A> method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A> methods to create <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls that represent the header, footer, separator, and data-bound items contained in the data list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A>方法来创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>表示标头、 页脚、 分隔符，和数据列表中包含的数据绑定项的控件。

trans-unit.source: You can access the data-bound items for the data list through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问通过数据列表的数据绑定项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can access all item types, including the header, footer, and separator items, through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问所有项类型，包括页眉、 页脚和分隔符项，通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method to customize how <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls are created or added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法以自定义如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>创建或添加到控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A> method to customize templates for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> control.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A>方法以自定义模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any button is clicked in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当单击 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中的任一按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand> event is raised when any button is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control and is commonly used when you have a button control with a custom `CommandName` value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand>在中单击任何按钮时引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件并通常用时必须具有自定义的按钮控件`CommandName`值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.target: 当在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中创建项时在服务器上发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is created, both during round-trips and at the time data is bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>中的项时将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>创建控件，在往返过程和时将数据绑定到控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event is commonly used to control the content and appearance of a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>事件通常用于控制的内容和外观中某一行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).

trans-unit.target: 当项被数据绑定到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> event is raised after an item is data bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>项被绑定到的数据之后，将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: This event provides you with the last opportunity to access the data item before it is displayed on the client.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可为你提供访问的数据项，客户端上显示之前的最后机会。

trans-unit.source: After this event is raised, the data item is no longer available.
trans-unit.target: 将引发此事件后，数据项目不再可用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> objects representing the individual items within the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示控件内单独项的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection" /> that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> objects representing the individual items within the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection" />，它包含表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> 控件内单独项的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection to programmatically control the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>以编程方式控制中的项的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection does not provide any methods to add or remove items to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>集合不提供任何方法来添加或删除到集合的项。

trans-unit.source: However, you can control the contents of an item by providing a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以通过提供的处理程序来控制项的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Only items bound to the data source are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 只有绑定到数据源项包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The header, footer, and separator are not included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中不包括页眉、 页脚和分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that contains the style properties for the items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象，该对象包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一个空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性提供的项自定义样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 常见样式属性，可调整包括前景颜色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的样式增强的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 项中的样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件从一个项样式属性继承到另一个层次结构。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 由层次结构中较高的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置得较低的项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性、 中的所有其他项样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件还具有红色字体。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供通用控件外观。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写继承的样式设置是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高级别的项样式属性的。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>属性，重写中指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand> event is raised when the `Edit` button is clicked for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>引发事件时`Edit`中的项单击按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand> event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to the selected row and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 典型处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>事件集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>于所选行的属性，然后将重新绑定数据到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.OnUpdateCommand%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.OnUpdateCommand%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>事件。

trans-unit.target: 它允许你更新中的选定的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>使用用户输入的新值的控件时`Update`单击按钮。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.OnUpdateCommand(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.OnUpdateCommand(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the control hierarchy for rendering in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 准备控件层次结构以便在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中呈现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.PrepareControlHierarchy%2A> method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.PrepareControlHierarchy%2A>主要由控件开发人员使用方法，派生自定义控件从时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.PrepareControlHierarchy%2A> prepares the control hierarchy and sets styles for contained <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls before the child controls are rendered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.PrepareControlHierarchy%2A>准备控件层次结构并设置样式，为包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>控制在呈现的子控件之前。

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.PrepareControlHierarchy" /> method to customize styles for controls contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> before they are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.PrepareControlHierarchy" />方法以自定义控件中包含的样式<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" />它们呈现之前。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: 表示在客户端上呈现 HTML 内容的输出流的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the list items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 呈现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中的列表项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RenderContents%2A> method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RenderContents%2A>派生从自定义控件时，方法使用主要由控件开发人员<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RenderContents%2A> method renders the inner content of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control, including the contained <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RenderContents%2A>方法呈现内容的内部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件，包括所包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RenderContents%2A> method in a custom server control so that some text precedes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RenderContents%2A>方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便一些文本之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns to display in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中显示的列数。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to display in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中显示的列数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="0" />, which indicates that the items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control are displayed in a single row or column, based on the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="0" />，它指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中的项基于 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection" /> 属性的值按单行或单列显示。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the number of columns that display items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定的显示中的项的列数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set this property to `5`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control displays its items in five columns.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果将此属性设置为`5`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件五个列中显示它的项。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `0`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control displays its items in a single row or column, based on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`0`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件将显示在单个行或列中，基于值的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items are displayed in a single row.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`的项显示在单个行。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items are displayed in a single column.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Vertical`的项显示在单个列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A> property to specify the number of columns to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>属性来指定要在中显示的列数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.target: 指定的列数是负值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control displays vertically or horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件是垂直显示还是水平显示。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Vertical" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Vertical" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property to specify the display direction of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>属性指定的显示方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns displayed is always determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 显示的列数始终由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items in the list are displayed in columns loaded from top to bottom, then left to right, until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Vertical`，列表中的项是从上到下，加载的列中显示，然后从左到右，直到呈现出所有项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A> property is set to `3`, the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in three columns, as in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>属性设置为`3`中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件显示三个列，如下所示下表中。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items in the list are displayed in rows loaded from left to right, then top to bottom, until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`，列表中的项显示在从左到右加载的行中，自上而下，直到呈现出所有项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A> property is set to `3`, the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in rows of three items each, as in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>属性设置为`3`的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件中的三个项，每行显示下表中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property to specify the direction in which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>属性中指定的方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>显示控件。

trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the control is displayed in a table or flow layout.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件是在表中显示还是在流布局中显示。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the control is displayed in a table or in flow layout.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值指定控件是在表中显示还是在流布局中显示。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> property to specify whether the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in a table.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性指定是否中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件显示表中。

trans-unit.source: The only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> values that are supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Flow>.
trans-unit.target: 唯一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>支持的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Flow>。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`, the items in the list are displayed in a table.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Table`，列表中的项显示在表中。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`, the items in the list are displayed without a table structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Flow`，列表中的项显示没有的表结构。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is displayed in a table, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.GridLines%2A> property to specify a grid line style.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件显示表中，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.GridLines%2A>属性可指定网格线样式。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性指定的布局样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the control view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 保存自页回发到服务器后发生的控件视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> view state.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 视图状态更改的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SaveViewState%2A> method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SaveViewState%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些值会自动放置在服务器控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性，它是实例的<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象的服务器控件的生命周期的保存状态阶段后。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element.
trans-unit.target: 保存视图状态，此字符串对象被作为存储在隐藏的 HTML 输入元素

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SaveViewState%2A> method and modifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property for your server control.
trans-unit.target: 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写中提高效率<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SaveViewState%2A>方法并修改<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>服务器控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中的选定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中的选定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedIndex%2A> property to programmatically specify the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedIndex%2A>属性以编程方式指定中的选定的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to determine the index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性来确定所选的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedIndex%2A> property is zero based.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedIndex%2A>属性是从零开始。

trans-unit.source: To deselect an item, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedIndex%2A> property to `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消选择某个项目，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedIndex%2A>属性`-1`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedIndex%2A> property is stored in control state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedIndex%2A>属性存储在控件状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中选定项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that contains the style properties for the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象，该对象包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中选定项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一个空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于提供自定义样式中的选定项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 常见样式属性，可调整包括前景颜色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的样式增强的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 项中的样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件从一个项样式属性继承到另一个层次结构。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 由层次结构中较高的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置得较低的项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性、 中的所有其他项样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件还具有红色字体。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供通用控件外观。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写继承的样式设置是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高级别的项样式属性的。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>属性，重写中指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了从最高到最低的层次结构顺序。

trans-unit.source: Precedence
trans-unit.target: 优先级

trans-unit.source: Style Property
trans-unit.target: 样式属性

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the selected item, place the `<SelectedItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定选定项的自定义样式，将放置`<SelectedItemStyle>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<SelectedItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出内打开的样式特性`<SelectedItemStyle>`标记。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中选定项的模板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，它包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控件中选定项的模板。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemTemplate%2A> property to control the contents of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>属性控制的选定项的内容。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the selected item is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所选的项的外观由控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the selected item, place the `<SelectedItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定选定项的模板，将放置`<SelectedItemTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<SelectedItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<SelectedItemTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。
