trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorTemplate%2A> property to control the contents of the separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorTemplate%2A>属性来控制内容的项之间的分隔符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The separator allows you to place an element with custom content between each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符可以放置包含在每个项之间的自定义内容的元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 项之间的分隔符的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the separator, place the `<SeparatorTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定分隔符的模板，将放置`<SeparatorTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<SeparatorTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<SeparatorTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand> event is raised when the `Update` button for an item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>引发事件时`Update`按钮的单击某项。

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand> event updates the data, sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 典型处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>事件更新的数据，集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>属性`-1`（以取消选择项），然后将重新绑定数据到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: It allows you to update the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control with the new values entered by the user when the `Update` button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 它允许你更新中的选定的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>使用用户输入的新值的控件时`Update`单击按钮。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="Update" /> command name.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see langword="Update" /> 命令名。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommandName> field to represent the `Update` command name.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommandName>字段来表示`Update`命令名称。
